Posts.Content: Thank you for doing that. I dont understand the tagging. Useless on the computer.lol
Posts.Title: discomfort from reconstruction 4 years later

Posts.Content: I had reconstruction with tissue taken from my stomache 4 years ago. I am experiencing alot of discomfort in my stomache area, from scar to under my breasts.Was wondering if anyone else has, and how long it will continue.
Posts.Title: discomfort from reconstruction 4 years later

Posts.Content: Hi, I had that as well and was told the same. It did settle down, but now i get sharp pains, spasms and over all discomfort. Perhaps I do too much and am irritating the scar tissue. Thank you for your response and good luck. Dont do too much, and no heavy lifting.lol
